Lickilicky is a really good pokemon imo It get access to stab Explosion A feat only possible for Lickilicky iirc which can KO most pokemon in the game and ha a really diverse movepool however A physical set is what work for me so wew You can run a special variant if you want Also it s decently bulky so it s likely to survive lot of attack a long a they re not fighting type Held Items should really only be either a silk scarf or leftover maybe even expert belt thinking For move i d suggest Return Most reliably powerful stab move it ha Next to explosion Explosion For all reason above Also for when Lickilicky s about to faint A last ditch effort Power Whip Great power and deal with pesky rock type The last move can be anything from Fire Punch to Gyro ball tbh I would recommend fire punch flamethrower though to deal with steel type For a special variant you could use Return unfortunately Lickilicky doesn t really get a good normal stab special move apart from hyper beam so you ll have to make do Hyper Beam Basically a lower powered le risky explosion although it leaf you vulnerable for a turn Water Pulse Surf Same reason for power whip deal with rock ground type Flamethrower or if you re feeling risky Focus Blast for steel type Lickilicky ha always been one of my favorite pokemon and it s for all of the reason above and it s really underrated the only thing I don t like is that it s really slow but that s not that big of a deal tbh also explosion is a fairly difficult TM to obtain in platinum but trust me it s worth it Anyway those are just the set I use feel free to use them yourself or modify them

Why Torterra is actually good not to spite you or anything just that it s one of my favourite starter Please don t hate me For starter pun intended even though Torterra is weak to Infernape the best Infernape can do for a while is flame wheel which is easily tankable thanks to it s bulky defence Yes special attack cripple it but would you actually see an Infernape use a special move Second move like Giga Drain can be helpful a it sacrifice a bit of power for the ability to heal Curse could also be viable a it s already slow a heck why not just up it s other stats instead I used only grottle to beat gardenia using curse so it s a good early game option What I m saying is that not all pokemon have to only have attacking move Synthesis could also be another option Third many pokemon could be used to build a team around a the vast amount of TMs that can be put on certain pokemon cover most of Torterra s weakness Personally getting an altaria in this gen is extremely useful a it can be taught move like ice beam and earthquake giving it to Gallade it kind of a waste a fighting move cover some of the thing that earthquake is super effective againts Steel rock etc Even if you Have some other weakness your fire type or in my instance a clefable with flamethrower can deal with those threat for you Finally I think that torterra is a pokemon for more advanced player to use It s tanky nature make it difficult to grasp for the le experienced player making Infernape a good a it is kind of an easy mode for the game Understanding that not all pokemon are fast sweeper make it easier to appreciate how good Torterra is Not saying to don t expect all pokemon to be fast sweeper it s just your preferance I hope that you appreciate what I wa saying I m not trying to make you look bad or anything I m just spreading mu opinion out a bit Thanks Btw I reaaaallly love your channel 3

Torterra is actually better than Empoleon you and HDEvee really need to stop labelling it a bad all because of speed But it s based off a turtle Correction tortoise and yes there is a big difference between the two that s cool I get the concept If you like the design that s dope The problem lie with it speed Did your microphone glitch out at some point and you didn t know it cut off some of your dialogue or you intentionally or unintentionally edit out what you said after talking about the design and before going back to the stats or did you actually just try to sweep the design s explanation for the low speed under the rug and hope that no one notice Complaining about speed understanding the reason why and ignoring it and going straight back to complaining just look pathetic The problem is it get outran by literally everything oh yeah there definitely aren t any slower Pokemon out there and ALL Pokemon that don t have high speed are hopeless this sentence is sarcastic by the way It s not only a TORTOISE again not a turtle but it s also a CONTINENT Both are known for moving slow and continent can cause limitless amount of destruction no matter how fast they move And you STILL expect these two combined to be a fast a at least a little kid on a bike or scooter And you clearly never heard of the story the tortoise and the hare Also there are move and item that deal with it speed stop labelling slow a bad

Suggestions for the BW Samurott and Serperior Samurott Team 1 Samurott 2 Stoutland 3 Swoobat 4 Krookodile 5 Darmanitan 6 Ferrothorn Serperior team 1 Serperior 2 Stoutland 3 Swoobat 4 Seismitoad 5 Darmanitan 6 Vanillux There s not too many in the original BW game but I grew up with these so I know some good coverage with these guy And Mystic if you re wondering why I chose some over others you might ve thought of here are some reason Swoobat ha a base 114 speed compaired to Sigilyphs 97 speed Sure Woobat ha much le Sp Atk than Sigilyph but it still ha some nice STAB move for the game and can do away with Bianca s Cheren s Pignite Emboar and Cheren s Serperior Seismitoad is a great water and ground type while not having much in term of coverage it shuts down Elisa s Volt Switch tactic greatly and Tympole evolves rather fast Vanillux because flying type coverage I can t think of any other but I would appreciate if you gave these some thought

use giga impact buyable tm instead of take down and avoid recoil and keep fly a the sole flying type damaging attack and use the next slot for defog hm Close combat is a useful attack on this pokemon but having gallade on your team can also let you consider another attack in this slot such a quick attack always attack first aerial ace never miss or agility get more speed Steel wing if you are ok with using single use tm on your pokemon 3 Why leaf blade and earthquake on gallade since you have such type coverage on your starter you can use x scissor for coverage on gallade which is a tm you can reobtain later in battle point For the 4th attack you can use slash night slash even false swipe to be able to catch pokemon and possibly hypnosis also for sleeping them and catching pokemon but doe not work if you used worry seed by your starter 4 Houndoom why physical attack on him when the special attack is better than attack instead do flamethrower dark pulse nasty plot and sludge bomb or shadow ball 5 Lickylicky or possibly just use Bibarel and give it the remaining hm you need 6 For a water type I don t like what magikarp evolves into Pick another water type such a floatzel Can teach it a water hm if you can t fit all your hm on the other pokemon such a bibarel You can use waterfall on floatzel while bibarel can get surf floatzel can learn ice fang and crunch and you can give it the non buyable tm iron tail After some analysis it ha come to be known that 2 type can hit the entire national dex including modern generation of pokemon either neutral damage or super effective Those type are ghost and fighting the same type a marshadow this also applies to earlier generation since the 7th generation is the most type diverse generation and this condition still applies But not for inversion battle in the newer game

That ’ s a good team but I ’ d still make change I ’ d rather teach Gallade Sword Dance over Eq Why teach Gallade Eq when it ha Close Combat and Psycho Cut That coverage hit the exact same type except electric It would be better to teach Eq to Gyarados so that it can beat the electric type that threaten it Sword Dance in Gallade make it insanely strong In place of Take Down I ’ d give Staraptor Return It ’ s better in every way The only downside to it is that it depends on happiness friendship so I ’ d wait before actually using the tm I think you can check if happiness is maxed out by talking to the person in the house on the beach before Pastoria City If it ’ s maxed then you will get a ribbon Not sure why you would even consider using Lickylicky If you need a Surf user I recommend Vaporeon or Gastrodon Then can also learn Ice Beam They are both good since they are insanely bulky Gastrodon might be the better choice because it ha a better typing a it is part ground so it immune to electric Plus it get Recover at level 54 To be honest I ’ ve used Houndoom before in Platinum and I think that it ’ s pretty useless Sure it beat Byron Candice and Aaron but so doe Torterra Staraptor and Gallade The only reason you ’ re using it is for Lucian and in my experience Houndoom doe badly against him I find that it ’ s too slow and get OHKOed by Focus Blast which every member of his team ha And even if he miss and you land a Dark Pulse the damage isn ’ t that great and by the end of the turn you will be hoping that he miss the next Focus Blast To replace it I would use Drapion To be honest I ’ ve never actually used one in Platinum but I think that it would do better because it ’ s better for beating Lucian which is Houndoom ’ s only job It ha a better typing which leaf it with one weakness It get Crunch at level 49 and Toxic Spikes at level 28 But I don ’ t know how easy Skorupis are to find So if it were up to me the team would be Torterra Earthquake
